mapper.select: SELECT dpNo, dNo, mpd.docNo, mpd.docVersion, dd.productCode, dd.productName, plantCode, plantName, stdAmount, divWeight, lineCode, lineName, bagAmout, bomRate, numBong, numBox, totWeight, docProdName, loss, getCodeName('PRODCAT',dd.productCategory), compWeight, regNum,adminWeight, distPeriDoc, dispWeight, distPeriSite, prodStandard, ingredient, keepCondition, packUnit, childHarm, note, menuProcess, standard , DATE_FORMAT(mpd.regDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as regDate, getUserName(mpd.regUserId) as regUserName, DATE_FORMAT(mpd.modDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as modDate, getUserName(mpd.modUserId) as modUserName,state,mpd.regUserId, mpd.modUserId, docType, apprNo, (select count(*) from comment where tbType = 'manufacturingProcessDoc' and tbKey = mpd.dNo) as editCnt , (select count(dSNo) from manufacturingProcessDocSubProd where dNo = mpd.dNo) as subProdCnt , (select sum(convert(replace(excRate, 'NaN', '0'),float)) from manufacturingProcessDocDisp where dNo = mpd.dNo) as sumExcRate , (select sum(convert(replace(incRate, 'NaN', '0'),float)) from manufacturingProcessDocDisp where dNo = mpd.dNo) as sumIncRate , ifnull(mpd.stlal, '') as stlal , DATE_FORMAT(dd.launchDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as launchDate FROM devDoc dd inner join manufacturingProcessDoc mpd on dd.docNo = mpd.docNo and dd.docVersion = mpd.docVersion where mpd.docNo = #{docNo} and mpd.docVersion = #{docVersion}# and dd.isHidden != 'Y' order by dpNo desc
